meta.title: Subscription based services
meta.d:tDo:
Argue what subscription based services try to solve.
Need of revenue stream to finance operations. A low capacity utilization is present. A need for a certain amount of capacity. Maintaining capacity development capacity with minimal capacity utilization.
Undeveloped rights (see German right to transfer licenses and right to circumvent DRM if software cannot be run otherwise) Service providers try to mark something as a product sell, also it is a subscription. This way, the advantage of both are on the seller and the disadvantages of both are on the buyer. Right to cancel subscription at any time
